property.label: Regular expression match on the EPC
property.description: If provided, this regular expression will be used to match the EPC of incoming events

property.label: Regular expression match on the Reader EPC
property.description: If provided, this regular expression will be used to match the reader EPC of incoming events

property.label: Regular expression match on the Reading Type
property.description: If provided, this regular expression will be used to match the reading type of incoming events

property.label: Regular expression match on the Reading Value
property.description: If provided, this regular expression will be used to match the reading value of incoming events

property.label: Regular expression match on the Status Message
property.description: If provided, this regular expression will be used to match the status messages of the incoming events

property.label: Hidden Queues
property.description: List of Hidden Queues for the filter

property.label: Database connection prefix
property.description: Database connection prefix

property.label: Default time threshold (in millis)
property.description: The time of tag absence in milliseconds that triggers a remove event

property.label: Default loop threshold
property.description: The number of reader passes for which a tag should be absent to trigger a remove event

property.label: Alternate time threshold
property.description: An alternate time threshold that has to be satisfied before a remove event is sent, unless the alternate loop threshold is satisfied

property.label: Alternate loop threshold
property.description: An alternate loop threshold that has to be satisfied before a remove event is sent, unless the alternate time threshold is satisfied

property.label: Time between cleanup operations (in millis)
property.description: The background process that cleans up absent tags to send remove events is scheduled at the given frequency

property.label: Class Name
property.description: The full name of the class that implements EMS unit

property.label: Hidden Queues
property.description: List of Hidden Queues for the filter

property.label: Positive noise threshold (in millis)
property.description: Time to wait, in milliseconds, before sending a tag addition through. If a removal is detected, the tag addition event will be dropped

property.label: Negative noise threshold (in millis)
property.description: Time to wait, in milliseconds, before sending a tag removal through. If an addition is detected, the tag removal event will be dropped

property.label: Maximum events to buffer
property.description: The maximum number of events to buffer for noise filtering
